title: Lockerbie: 30 Years On
overview: A parish priest, a rookie police officer, a local farmer, a young reporter and a mother of three from Florida - five different lives impacted by the bombing of Pan Am 103.

title: Jills vs Mays 2
overview: The infamous Billy Mays has arisen once again to sell and take names but he is not the only one who is back not so famous detective Jills Hallway is back as well and doesn't know why. Will Jills be able to put a stop to The Billy Mays Killer once and for all?

title: The Scout Law
overview: When a prized diamond is stolen, Mack puts together a team of detectives to go find the thief.
tagline: To be great you have to take the oath.

title: Little Italy: Volume II
overview: In the long awaited sequel to "Little Italy", Don Storniolo deals with Don Gazpacho's death, the challenges of rebuilding his business, and being hunted by Federal Agents.
tagline: Don Storniolo deals with Don Gazpacho's death, the challenges of rebuilding his business, and being hunted by Federal Agents.

title: Ouroboros
overview: Inspector Matiphlos is investigating a group of drug traffickers suspected of killing Inspector Roland, very famous in the community. His investigation will not be effortless because all the investigators who inspected the case were murdered. Many witnesses but no evidence, what happens to Roland's wife? Will Inspector Iris Matiphlos reach the end of her investigation?

title: Testament
overview: Liu Ziying was imprisoned three years ago for drug trafficking. He performed well in prison and had a high cultural quality. He was arranged to write a suicide note to the death penalty inmates. Before he was released from prison, Xu Xiaolong, the death penalty prisoner, wanted Liu Ziying to write a suicide note to him and told him that if he helped him fulfil his will, he would give Liu Ziying a sum of money. After Liu Ziying was released from prison, he acquired money by helping the death penalty prisoners fulfil their will. After tasting the sweetness, he embarked on a road of self-redemption.

title: My Son The Serial Killer
overview: A documentary examining one of the UK's most notorious criminals, as Steve Wright's father Conrad offers his deeply personal insights into the horrific crimes his son committed. Steve Wright, dubbed the Suffolk Strangler', murdered five women who worked as prostitutes and dumped their bodies in the countryside around Ipswich in 2006, and was jailed for life in 2008. The programme also features an exclusive interview with Isabella Clennel, the mother of one of the women brutally murdered by Steve Wright, as she opens up about the impact her daughter Paula's death had - and continues to have - on her family.

title: Fritzl - The Monster: 10 Years On
overview: The case of the Austrian man who kept his daughter prisoner for 24 years in the cellar of his house, until she was released in 2008 at the age of 42. Dramatically pleading guilty to all of the charges at the last moment of the trial, he was sentenced to life in a secure unit for incest, imprisonment, raping the victim - who bore seven children - and causing the death of one child by neglect. This documentary explores the crime itself, Fritzl's trial and the aftermath for everyone involved, and ponders how anyone can possibly recover from such an ordeal

title: Rise of the Avalanche
overview: Rise of the Avalanche takes place in the very neo-noir future in the year 4225, where the criminal mastermind Avalanche Steele executes stage one of his evil plot to exact revenge and take back control over Envision City. Tensions rise as Detective Sal starts to unravel the plot and confronts the well-known crime boss Clyde Simms about the truth.

title: We're Not Kids Anymore
overview: Two young offenders meet at community service.

title: Black Maple Lane
overview: 'Black Maple Lane' is a student film made back in 2017 about Clarence who has just recently been released from prison for an unknown offense, and his brother Micahel whose character is just as shady. Over the course of the afternoon, both brothers have to make tough decisions and deal with the consequences.

title: The Mole
overview: Hirai has embezzled money and has to leave - but first she wants to see her mother one last time.

title: The Rapture: La Pinacoteca
overview: Detective Conad is investigating suspicious events regarding an Art Gallery and the paintings of the mysterious artist "The Rapture".

title: Shanghai Ballers
overview: a film about 3 friends trying to play for the Chinese Basketball Association

title: Stray Dog
overview: A troubled teenager unable to connect with the normal youngsters of his age seeks to impress a local gang in a desperate attempt to be accepted leading to devastating consequences.

title: Hall Cop
overview: A high school hall cop takes a shot at redemption after running into two jumping hooligans.

title: Silence Snow
overview: An ideological struggle, an unpredictable death, on the road to escape, is the mystery of the brothers' dying and identity. The mysterious Ewenki, a low-key silent man, a confusing identity, a difficult fusion of modernity and tradition, a painful time of grievances and entanglements, a fierce confrontation between humanity and emotions, how to be good and evil, true and false endings...

title: Siberian Tigers
overview: An eastern European crime boss sends two experienced criminals to collect money from a job; one decides to take the money for himself.

title: Face On
overview: Famous Remake of Face/Off (1997)

title: Britain's Teenage Drug Runners
overview: With astonishing access, BBC Three explores how gang members are using teenage drug runners to sell large amounts of crack and heroin miles away from home.

title: Diamondz
overview: Diamondz is a movie based on seven young ladies that have no parental guidance trying to find their way. Making a few bad decisions along the way, many lessons are learned along their journey. Together they will learn about true friendship, betrayal, heart ache and pain. While experiencing sensuous and steamy encounters at the same time, this movie will intrigue and stimulate you, whatever your experience with romantic or friendly relationships may be. Learn about the differences between seven woman and the circumstances that shape their interesting lives. Travel with them as they come to find out, life's no fairytale.

title: The First 24
overview: Anthony grapples with the depth and sincerity of his feelings for his partner Donovan, and starts to question the validity of the relationship. The question that plagues Anthony’s mind: Is Donovan the right one, or is he the one for right now? Lots of couples let the wedding jitters plague their mind, but very few will talk about it openly. The First 24 explores the relationship we with our partner, but also the relationships with the people we call “family” who are also an enormous part of our personal and social identity.

title: Sara Stein - Shalom Berlin, Shalom Tel Aviv
overview: Berlin criminal investigator Sara Stein cultivates a low-key style. No superwoman, she abhors violence and relies on her gift for convincing others that she‘s trustworthy. Above all, she enjoys working in Berlin and Tel Aviv. Her being Jewish is a major asset, since she can navigate sure-footedly through the morass of explosive and impenetrable conflicts among Jews, Arabs and Palestinians. Sara‘s a team worker, whether she and her colleagues are working on the case of a murdered woman DJ in Berlin or that of a manslaughter out of compassion in Tel Aviv. Though she falls in love with the Israeli pianist David, she is fiercely independent and reluctant to commit herself. She lives for her cases and, beyond this, for a dream of peace in her beloved Israel.

title: Trapping 214
overview: Two hustlers searching for a bigger payday and way to break free from there ties to Tony The Collector a ruthless kingpin known for his violent tortuous tactics accept a job offer unlike any before Given a list of names and small box with special instructions if completed they could gain stability Betrayal and greed all spawn from the dirt of man How far would you go to become a kingpin?

title: Forouzan
overview: The thieves want to rob her cattle but she finds it out.

title: Gun No 6
overview: This is the untold story of Britain’s deadliest illegal gun. Charting every shooting of Gun No 6 and  exposing the realities of modern gun crime.

title: Cade & Eugene's Platonic Love Story
overview: Hungover and struggling to recall the events of the Christmas party they attended, two best friends are called into the police station for questioning. One worries of what could happen to them whilst the other ignores his friend's anxieties in pursuit of love.

title: The Green Elephant Part 2
overview: A sequel to the 1999's movie "The Green Elephant"

title: Weed Eaters
overview: A pair of stoners bite off more than they can chew after using their landscaping company to score free food from a local buffet. Jake and Connor must stay one step ahead of the suspicious and shady restaurant manager, hide their drug habits, mow plenty of lawns and smoke plenty of weed all while navigating the strange and murky waters of millennial life.

title: Who Is Donnie Rudd? Keith Morrison Investigates
overview: Journalist Keith Morrison investigates a decades-long saga of love, death and suspicion involving a former lawyer and alleged scientist. Talking to family members and associates, Morrison tries to piece together Rudd's history.

title: The Devil Series
overview: The Devil is a demon who did unbelievable Devastation with his unbelievable Power, believes in terrorism his Motives lead to destruction on India fights with bob. Now see how bob saves india from of the devil.
tagline: The Devil is a demon who did unbelievable Devastation with his unbelievable Power, believes in terrorism his Motives lead to destruction on India fights with bob. Now see how bob saves India from of the devil.

title: The flower of Piazza Vetra
overview: A young street singer is running in the night.

title: Episode?
overview: Orphan episode of a lost detective series. A rookie detective is teamed up with a seasoned murder cop, whose break-down results in the disintegration of the show.

title: Maids
overview: Inspired by Augusto Monterroso’s Maids, this short film combining fiction and dance presents a maid ballerina embodying the voices of two stock radio drama lovers who plan to murder her with their own hands.

title: Leningrad - Sobczak's Shades
overview: Blurring the line between music video and cinema, this short based on Russian rock band's Leningrad's song of the same name tells the story of a drug addicted woman narrated by her in the past tense. Seemingly spurred by an act of charity that she reads as condescension, the woman helps her boyfriend commit a robbery of a wealthy, powerful criminal.

title: Come With Me
overview: Mateus looks back on his eighteenth birthday, a day that changed his life forever.

title: Hoje Jesus Não Vem
overview: Three stories about children and adolescents in Brazil and the various violations of their rights.

title: JFK: The Lost Assassination Tapes
overview: Hundreds of hours of news reports from the days surrounding the assassination of President Kennedy.

title: The Bulger Killers: Was Justice Done?
overview: Key individuals involved in the trial of Robert Thompson and Jon Venables for the murder of 2-year-old James Bulger are brought together 25 years on to debate the verdict.

title: Beyond Evil: The Murder of Becky Watts
overview: The story behind the murder of 16-year-old Becky Watts, who was killed by her stepbrother Nathan Matthews and his 21-year-old girlfriend Shauna Hoare in Bristol, England in February 2015.

title: Chandra Levy: Who Killed Chandra?
overview: An intern vanishes from the most powerful city in America, rumors of an affair with a married congressman spread quickly. A year later her body is found and over fifteen years later the case remains unsolved.

title: Piedra, Papel, Tijera
overview: Waking up in an abandoned warehouse, where you are tied to chair, is not the worst thing that can happen to you, if there is a psychopath in front of you gambling your liberty with a children game… Play your cards well and make certain you win if you want to live!

title: JonBenét Ramsey, le meurtre de la mini miss
Victim
overview: A boy gets into a dangerous affair with a mob after stealing a briefcase from one of the mob's members.

title: Uncommon Allies
overview: In a region marked by gun violence and homicide, where victims even happen to be children, watch how the community has begun dealing with the dire issues. Get inspired by the soulful interventions of Rosalin, be motivated by the initiatives taken by Kansas police department and get to know how the touching way in which a community can begin to heal itself.

title: Semper Invicta
overview: Two detectives attempt to unravel the mystery behind a dead body found in the midst of a gang massacre

title: Monarch
overview: The film depicts a private eye who is hired by a woman to find her missing husband, a known heroin addict. From there our hero dives into the seedy underbelly of Dayton, OH only to find that not everything is as he once knew.

title: Resilience Eludes Death: The Making
overview: Struggling through life's journey, Chaquis Maliq manages to overcome the odds of being overshadowed by a male dominant industry, by self-producing her latest music project.
tagline: Struggling through life's journey, Chaquis Maliq manages to overcome the odds of being overshadowed by a male dominant industry, by self-producing her latest music project.

title: Killstreak
overview: Two x-play gamers think they'll make some easy money after accepting an offer to document their game play.

title: The Colour Red
overview: A short film neo-noir following one of the cases of Detective Grayson, as he looks into the murder of multi-millionaire William Schubert.
tagline: One pill makes you larger and one pill makes you small

title: Soham Revisited: 15 Years On
overview: Looks back at the murders of 10-year-old schoolgirls Jessica Chapman and Holly Wells at the hands of Ian Huntley, the caretaker of the school they attended in the quiet village of Soham, Cambridgeshire.

title: Bloody Guard Dart
overview: The film mainly tells the murder of a group of revolutionaries disguised as a caravan. Ren Weiming received the task: cooperate with the Tongmenghui to escort a batch of arms to the south to prepare for an armed uprising against Yuan Shikai, and in the middle of the journey, he started a journey of open and secret battles with small warlords, bandits, and black market merchants.

title: Myanmar's Killing Fields
overview: Secret footage and eyewitness accounts shine new light on a brutal campaign by the Myanmar military against Rohingya Muslims — an effort that has been described by both the United Nations and the United States as “ethnic cleansing.”

title: The Unfortunate Faces of Portia Dupree
overview: A notable business man's daughter is found dead in their home. A homicide detective has the difficult task of sorting through three female suspects only to discover that the victim is terrifying them.

title: Into The Flame
overview: Hacker, Jon Mitchell steals government documents and is hunted down by hired assassin and hacker, Anonymous who would stop at nothing to fulfill the contract.
tagline: You are no longer in control.

title: MUCK
overview: A heist goes wrong when one of the robbers isn't what he seems.

title: Everglade
overview: Isolated in the remote Floridian swamp, a woman turns to dark means and the occult to help her control a mysterious creature.

title: All That You Could Be
overview: The story of Elio, a young heir to his father's company, with whom he has a strained relationship, that receives his first big task in the business: to pay his father's debts to a loan shark. This night a revealed secret will change the lives of these three men in violent ways.

title: The Dick
overview: The Dick thinks the dame is wasting his time but she knows his time is almost up.

title: Deranged
overview: Julie is a seventeen year old school girl. She mysteriously gets impregnated by an unidentified man and the father disowns her which lands her broken life into the hands of a hopeless psychotic guy Tembo.
tagline: Her only hope is in a hopeless guy

title: Death Valley: A Murder Mystery
overview: When a local mountain man is slain, it's up to investigators George Foreman and Turd Ferguson to crack the case.
tagline: The whodunit with a never-before-seen twist!

title: A Hungry Man Stares Out of his Window at Midnight
overview: Somewhere on a snowy night in London, a drug deal goes horribly wrong.

title: All About the Money
overview: All About The Money is the story of two amateur documentary filmmaker/plumbers that decide that the fast track to life may be a life of crime. Watch as they document every step of their journey.

title: Till the Following Morning
overview: Sarah is a girl that lives in a rich unreligious family in Tehran and lives in a studio apartment. One night Khosro (her boyfriend) comes to Sarah's apartment with his friend Khalil. On that night Sarah overdosed on alcohol and got temporary oblivion and when she gets up the next morning findsherself alone at the home. She finds two cell phones left by Khosro at her apartment. Unable to remember what has happened last night, suddenly she notices two blood stains on the carpet.

title: Speak of the Devil
overview: Chasing a serial killer will never bring back the dead. It's just gonna get worse.

title: Фіскали повторюються двічі
overview: First Ukrainian noir movie, brought to you by the "Agrarian decadence" group!  A story about why you should not care whether bootleggers pay the excise tax.

title: O Cravo
overview: O Cravo (The Carnation) revisits the old streets of Macau, from the point of view of film noir: a passionate Portuguese man, a broken heart, an intrigue, a dark alley, memories of a lost territory.
tagline: O Cravo (The Carnation) revisits the old streets of Macau, from the point of view of film noir: a passionate Portuguese man, a broken heart, an intrigue, a dark alley, memories of a lost territory.

title: Shots Fired in Buffalo: Land of the Snow
overview: 2 Crew Leaders and their teams collide due to a deal gone bad.

title: Escape
overview: A strong and independant lesbian welder struggles to deal with her abusive partner. A striking encounter with a mugger pushes her to take a decision.

title: Crime Behind Bars
overview: In 1967, an upper-class woman constantly relives the crime of the murder of her husband along with his lover. She realizes that her thoughts have no turning back, generating a paranoia in her days.

title: Active Shooter
overview: A documentary regarding the Active Shooter phenomenon, and how to protect businesses, schools, and other facilities from the threats of an active assailant.

title: Scissor
overview: Rama, a zealous sensitive youth of 28, has blinded his girlfriend in a fight with scissors. He is going to be sentenced to lex talionis (blinding of one of his eyes) in the court tomorrow. The night before the hearing, his influential father bails him out for one night by paying a lot of money, so Rama can be with his family the last night. But Rama has other plans. He takes the opportunity and helped by a friend, he goes to the south of Iran as a camera operator with a filming group to exit the country illegally. He makes a mistake and takes money from the bank and the police trace him. Rama pays money to some smugglers and they send him to a deserted island to wait for a launch that will take him abroad. Fate has something different in store for Rama and he falls for a pregnant woman on the island.

title: No Witnesses!
overview: A parody of the Chaplin and Keaton silent films of the 20’s and early 30’s. A couple young chaps end up in a violent confrontation after bumping into each other walking down the street, and when one chap accidentally kills the other, he is forced to find a place to hide the body.

title: Mr. Presto
overview: Lowell Brown, aka Mr. Presto, is a struggling children's magician who subscribes to a free-spirited philosophy while living out of his van. His brother Ray is a straight-laced, no-nonsense high school guidance counselor. When Lowell is mistaken for a hit man who is hired to kill a local small town politician, the brothers are uprooted and brought together in a tailspin adventure.

title: Onir
overview: Juh Ferraz travels to Mato Grosso to rebuild her childhood memories and learn the stories about her father, who was murdered in 2003. She believes that alcohol destroyed the lives of her father, and his family, causing the separation of her parents and your death. Her uncle Niva guides her along the paths taken by her father, who was a cowboy and a horse trainer, to understand the internal conflicts experienced by her father and herself.

title: Panginoong May Lupa
overview: A 2018 Filipino short film written, edited, and directed by Al-Jhun Virgo.

title: Ein mieser Tag
overview: As Freddy wakes up this morning, the day does not seem to go his way. His girlfriend cheats on him, his car breaks down and his boss threatens to fire him. In order to save his job, he embarks on a wild tour through the city with the slightly wacky and unpredictable Charlie.

title: Lockdown
overview: A short film about a students confrontation with two school shooters.

title: Anonymous Student Vlog
overview: A student vlogger was mistakenly identified as a prime suspect of a crime that went viral on social media.

title: Briefcase
overview: Set in 1987 Miami, two small time criminals are torn between being loyal to their boss and being loyal to their country after finding highly confidential documents in a briefcase that was supposed to contain narcotics instead.
